 About Us 
 Living Healthy is a weekly newsletter from readersdigest 
 filled with trusted tips on everything from wellness and 
 relationships to healthy eating and weight loss. You'll also 
 find nutritious recipes, uplifting true medical dramas and 
 stories about real people and a dose of humor to help keep 
 the doctor away.
